title: Iran’s Loyal Security Forces Protect Ruling System That Protesters Want to Topple
description: The Revolutionary Guards — the country’s most powerful military force — have become so deeply woven into Iran’s economy and power structure that they have everything to lose if the system falls.
dc:creator: Ben Hubbard and Farnaz Fassihi
media:description: The Revolutionary Guards, a force with hundreds of thousands of members, is separate from the national army and is charged specifically with defending the ruling system.
